mapper.select:
select t.rwmc, t.rwms, t1.mxmc, to_char(t.zxsj, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS') zxsj, t.mxid, t.rwid, t5.ztmc yxzt from znsjcl_zzfwzx_xtdr t left join znsjcl_dm_yxzt t5 on t.yxzt = t5.ztid, znsjcl_zzfwzx_yj_zdymx t1 where t.mxid = t1.mxid and t.yxbz = 'Y'
and t.rwmc like '%${svo.rwmc}%'
order by t.zxsj desc
